name: Out of Reach (itch) (craftwill, Linagur, Crazy Fat Turtle, yussefSD, angelsiu)
name_original: Out of Reach (itch) (craftwill, Linagur, Crazy Fat Turtle, yussefSD, angelsiu)
description:
This project was made by a team of 5 students for the CocoJam 2021.

Theme: "Direction"

In Out of reach, a man from work tries to reach the girl he loves by sending her a message in a paper airplane. 

Control the direction of the wind and make sure the plane reaches its destination while avoiding obstacles.

CocoJam challenges completed:

-SELF MADE ASSET-ER

-WATCHES STEVE IRWIN ONCE

-LOOK MA! ONE HAND!

-THE EGG CAME FIRST

-NOTICE ME SENPAI (Debatable)

-WE LOVE YOU TOO <3

Artist:  Sébastien Jacquoudet

Game Designer: Eloïse Gur

Programmers: William Gingras, Angeline Siv, Yussef Shehadeh
